Description: Rim sherd (mended from three fragments) of North Ionian pottery dinos; underside reserved; cream slip on outside; guilloche pattern on top of rim, sides glazed; on body band of tongues between bands, the lower with added red band lined in white. Highly micaceous rather coarse clay.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.394)
